1: <sup>1</sup> When the LORD turned again the captivity of Zion, we were like them that dream.
2: <sup>2</sup> Then was our mouth filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing: then said they among the heathen, The LORD hath done great things for them.
3: <sup>3</sup> The LORD hath done great things for us; whereof we are glad.
4: <sup>4</sup> Turn again our captivity, O LORD, as the streams in the south.
5: <sup>5</sup> They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.
6: <sup>6</sup> He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him.
